thread.title: Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text: I received my peach tree within the timeline specified. I got it planted... only time will tell about the rest. My only concern is that I would like to have received notification that the tree was on its way. It was delivered when I was out of town and sat on my porch for a week. With potential long-term delivery timeframes, a heads-up would be appreciated. Nonetheless, Thank You! I can't wait to see how the tree works out in my climate.
